$comment: Document-level configuration for build scripts. See DECISIONS.md DEC-005.

2024-1183.label: Amending Regulation
2024-1183.comment: Amending regulation contains 'patch' instructions, not standalone law. Use consolidated 910/2014 for RAG and terminology.

910-2014.label: Consolidated Regulation
910-2014.comment: Primary source of truth for current eIDAS law.

765-2008.label: Referenced Regulation
765-2008.comment: Foundational regulation defining conformity assessment, accreditation, and market surveillance frameworks. Referenced by eIDAS 910/2014.
